AMRN 2019 AGM for Amarin complete All motions passed Slide deck nothing new Most patents in place until 2030 Application to Europe market authority in late 2019 CVD is much bigger than cancer in USA Vascepa just keeps giving 1 fewer cardiac event in every 6 Possible generic competitor in place for 2029 at earliest 200 million available on their books JT upbeat saying this is just the beginning 4 or 5 shareholders in attendance 25 in the room all Amarin board and committee Early 2020 is plan for next phase of growth Plan to grow 20000 consultants to 50000 150 sales force to 400 Overall if they can get into Europe possible growth of 3040 Hopeful that smallest TG market down to 125mgdl is possible Diabetes and lipids specialists are already positive about the use of vascepa in other applications SP should be much higher and yet down 3 so far today
